Hello, I'm

Sofyen Nefzi

Full-Stack Developer

Get To Know More

About Me

Experience

6 months
Full-Stack Development at CNSS

Education

1- Bac Informatique
2- Licence en Business Computing (ESEN)

I am a creative developer who enjoys pushing boundaries and finding innovative solutions. With strong communication skills and a collaborative nature, I thrive in team environments. My critical thinking helps me analyze situations effectively, and I consistently meet deadlines to deliver quality results on time.

Explore My

Skills

Backend Development

Spring Boot (Java)

Oracle Database

PostgreSQL

REST APIs

Spring Security & JWT

JavaMail (Email Recovery)

Frontend Development

HTML/CSS

JavaScript

Other Skills

Python

PHP

Linux

Git & GitHub

Docker

Certifications

Google Cybersecurity

Professional Certificate

Microsoft Azure

Cloud Services

Spring Boot (Coursera)

IoC, DI, MVC & REST

English (B2)

EF SET

Browse My Recent

Projects

ESEN Joker Club

University club promotional website

ESEN Joker Club Website

Designed and developed the official website for our university's Joker Club. Features include event calendars, member profiles, and photo galleries. Implemented responsive design for all devices and optimized loading times.

HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript Bootstrap

Hotel Booking

Complete reservation system

Hotel Booking System

A comprehensive hotel management system with room booking functionality, admin dashboard, and payment integration. Developed as my final year project with secure user authentication and database management.

PHP MySQL JavaScript jQuery

Gourmet Restaurant

Elegant dining website

️ Gourmet Restaurant

Modern restaurant website with online reservation system, interactive menu, and food gallery. Focused on creating an elegant UI with smooth animations and intuitive navigation for the best user experience.

React CSS Modules Node.js

YouTube Downloader

Video download application

YouTube Video Downloader

Desktop application that downloads YouTube videos in multiple formats and resolutions. Includes progress tracking, playlist support, and quality selection options.

Python Tkinter Pytube

Ping Pong

Classic arcade game

Classic Ping Pong

A retro-style ping pong game with score tracking, difficulty levels, and multiplayer support. Built to understand game physics and real-time user input handling.

Python Turtle Game Dev

Tic Tac Toe

AI-powered game

❌⭕ AI Tic Tac Toe

Classic Tic Tac Toe with adjustable AI difficulty. Features include score history, player vs player mode, and responsive design that works on both desktop and mobile devices.

JavaScript Minimax Algorithm Responsive Design

Task Flow

Productivity Management Platform

✅ Task Flow

Full-stack productivity application with user authentication, project management, and task tracking. Features a responsive dashboard with productivity insights, priority-based task organization, and intuitive project categorization for seamless workflow management.

Spring Boot Angular MySQL JWT TypeScript

Job Search Automator

AI-Powered Recruitment Assistant

Job Search Automator

Intelligent automation system that streamlines job hunting by scraping relevant positions, analyzing job-description fit with AI, generating personalized cover letters, and organizing opportunities in a centralized dashboard. Revolutionized my job search process with smart automation and data-driven matching.

n8n AI Integration Web Scraping Google Sheets API Prompt Engineering

Explore In-Depth

Featured Project: CNSS Data Management Platform

Full-Stack Web Application - CNSS Tunisia (2025)

As part of my internship at the Caisse Nationale de Sécurité Sociale (CNSS) in Tunis (MED 5), I developed a secure web-based application for internal data management and automation.

Backend: Spring Boot, REST APIs, Spring Security, JWT
Frontend: Angular (TypeScript), HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap
⚙️ Core Feature: API Middleware to auto-extract and populate databases

API Integration Interface

Data Visualization Dashboard

Advanced Data Filtering

Data Loading Panel

Explore In-Depth

Featured Project: CNSS Admin CRUD System

Admin Management System - CNSS Tunisia (2025)

Developed a comprehensive admin dashboard with full CRUD functionality for user and data management.

  • Complete user management dashboard
  • Create/Read/Update/Delete operations
  • Advanced filtering and sorting
  • Bulk data import/export
  • Activity audit logs

Admin Login Panel

User Management Dashboard

Explore In-Depth

Featured Project: ESEN Digital Library System

Full-Stack Library Management System (2025)

Developed a comprehensive digital library platform for ESEN featuring advanced book management, dual-role authentication, and seamless borrowing processes.

  • Secure role-based authentication system
  • Complete book lifecycle management
  • Interactive book discovery interface
  • Automated loan tracking system
  • Real-time user administration
  • Cross-device responsive design

Tech Stack:

HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript PHP MySQL

Interactive Book Catalog with Advanced Filtering

Complete Book Management CRUD Interface

Modern Library Information Portal

Secure Multi-Role Login System

Personalized User Dashboard After Login

Streamlined Book Loan Process

Integrated Book Purchase Module

Comprehensive Administration Control Panel

Explore In-Depth

Featured Project: E-Commerce Analytics Dashboard

Full-Stack E-Commerce Analytics Platform (2024)

Developed a comprehensive e-commerce analytics dashboard featuring real-time performance tracking, customer behavior analysis, and campaign management for online businesses.

  • Real-time sales performance monitoring
  • Abandoned cart tracking and analysis
  • Customer acquisition cost (CAC) calculations
  • Product performance analytics
  • Advertising campaign ROI tracking
  • Customer segmentation and behavior analysis

Tech Stack:

Spring Boot Angular Oracle HTML5 CSS3 TypeScript

Main Dashboard with Performance Metrics

Product Performance Analytics

Customer Segmentation & Analysis

Advertising Campaign Performance Tracking

Explore My Automation

Featured Project: AI Agent Web Scraping

AI-Powered Web Scraping Agent (2025)

Developed an intelligent automation system that scrapes business data from multiple platforms through natural language commands. The AI agent understands requests and automatically selects the appropriate scraping tool for Google Maps, Yellow Pages, Apollo, and social media platforms.

  • Natural language processing for command interpretation
  • Multi-platform scraping (Google Maps, Yellow Pages, Apollo, Instagram, TikTok)
  • Automated data aggregation and cleaning
  • Real-time results delivered to Google Sheets
  • Intelligent tool selection based on query context
  • Apify integration for scalable web scraping

Tech Stack:

n8n OpenAI GPT-4 Apify Google Sheets API JavaScript REST APIs

Google Maps Integration in n8n

The Main Project and The Execution

Google Sheet Result

Apify Scraping

Get in Touch

Contact Me

sofien.nefzi@esen.tn
